scripts.start: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --short HEAD``git diff --quiet || echo '-dirty'` REACT_APP_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` react-scripts start
scripts.build: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --short HEAD``git diff --quiet || echo '-dirty'` REACT_APP_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` react-scripts build
scripts.test: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --short HEAD``git diff --quiet || echo '-dirty'` REACT_APP_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` react-scripts test --env=jsdom
scripts.eject: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --short HEAD``git diff --quiet || echo '-dirty'` REACT_APP_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` react-scripts eject
scripts.build:production: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --short HEAD``git diff --quiet || echo '-dirty'` REACT_APP_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` env-cmd -f .env.production react-scripts build
scripts.build:development: REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --short HEAD``git diff --quiet || echo '-dirty'` REACT_APP_GIT_BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` env-cmd -f .env.development react-scripts build
